text: Events from the year 1918 in Russia ==Events== * 7th Congress of the Russian Communist Party (Bolsheviks) * Left-wing uprisings against the Bolsheviks * Sheksna uprising * Execution of the Romanov family ==Births== ==Deaths== * February 7 – Alexander Taneyev, Russian composer (b. 1850) * October 4 – Nikolai Skrydlov, admiral (b. 1844) * November 9 – Sergey Andreyevsky, Russian writer, poet, literary critic and lawyer (b. 1847) * * * * ==References== Category:Years of the 20th century in Russia
title: 1918 in Russia
